pageContext.claim: “I never said what I'm saying now [calling for stronger background checks for gun sales]. … And we did do things after Parkland, but it wasn't to the same level that I'm talking about now. You know, we did do the Fix NICS and various other things.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. When political pressure rises for tighter gun controls, typically after a mass shooting, Trump usually says he's interested in strengthening federal requirements for background checks. But he invariably abandons those plans later on.
